title: 89/446/EEC: Commission Decision of 13 July 1989 amending Commission Decision 89/224/EEC recognizing certain parts of Belgium as being officially swine fever free (only the French and Dutch texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 13 July 1989
amending Commission Decision 89/224/EEC recognizing certain parts of Belgium as being officially swine fever free
(Only the French and Dutch texts are authentic)
(89/446/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In the Annex to Commission Decision 89/224/EEC the indent is replaced by the following:
'- The Provinces of LiĂ¨ge, Luxembourg, Namur, Brabant, Henegouwen and Limburg.'
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Belgium.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 July 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
